name: Coinrule
description:
Coinrule is a smart assistant for beginner-level cryptocurrency traders. 

With Coinrule you can easily build your own trading rules and strategies and set them up to run automatically on different crypto exchanges. It is the If-This-Then-That for cryptocurrency trading that allows you to pre-plan your crypto trading based on a wide range of indicators.

 With Coinrule you no longer need to sit for hours in front of charts and best of all? No coding skills are required! Anyone can use Coinrule.

team.bioHtml: I am a former banker, startup founder, consulting in economic development and with a major interest in anything blockchain. Founder of Coinrule.io

jobs.title: Head of Online Marketing [Salary + Stock Options + Flexible Hours]
jobs.description:
www.Coinrule.io   |   Sales Team  |   hr@Coinrule.io

At Coinrule.io we‚Äôre always looking ahead.
We want to create the best automatic crypto trading experience possible for our customers.

RESPONSABILITIES
Coinrule is looking for Online Marketing and Sales lead with a passion for the Crypto-currency sector. You love trading and innovation and enjoy empowering people. You can be based anywhere in the world or you are welcome to come and work from our offices in London at Google Campus.

‚Ä¢  Prospect for potential new clients and turn this into increased business
‚Ä¢  Identify potential client bases, and the decision makers within the Crypto industry.
‚Ä¢  Research and build relationships with new corporate B2B trading clients
‚Ä¢  Set up meetings between corporate client decision makers and company‚Äôs principals.
‚Ä¢  Work with team to develop partnership proposals that speaks to the client‚Äôs needs
‚Ä¢  Forecast sales targets and ensure they are met by the team
‚Ä¢  Expand the customer base with advertising initiatives on social media and in crypto communities

DESIRABLE
‚Ä¢  Attend industry events, such as association events and conferences, and provide feedback and information on market and creative trends
‚Ä¢  Present to and consult with senior level management on business trends with a view to developing new services, products, and distribution channels.
‚Ä¢  Identify opportunities for campaigns, services, and distribution channels that will lead to an increase in sales.
‚Ä¢  Using knowledge of the market and competitors, identify and develop the company‚Äôs unique selling propositions and differentiators.

REQUISITES
‚úì BS/BA in Marketing/Business or similar
‚úì Experience with face-to-face, phone and hands-on sales


BENEFITS
‚úì Flexible hours, 38 hours a week üèÇ
‚úì Stocks 0.5% to 0.7 % ü¶Ñ
‚úì ‚Ç¨500 yearly book/event allowance
‚úì Gym membership üéÅ

www.Coinrule.io

jobs.title: Lead Backend Developer [Salary, Stock Options, Flexible]
jobs.description:
Coinrule 
https://www.coinrule.io

At Coinrule, we want to create the best cryptocurrency trading for our customers. This requires real innovation, strategic vision and commitment.

Responsibilities

This is a great opportunity for an enthusiastic technology leader to join Coinrule.

As a leading backend developer, you will develop and oversee innovative software. You will motivate and provide expert technology advice to disseminate proposals in a rapidly evolving agile programming process. In addition, you will mentor a team of junior developers and set the direction for further product development using blockchain as the company continues to grow.

Requirements:

‚Ä¢ 5 or more years of proven experience as a back-end developer
‚Ä¢ Experience with Node.js, Python an advantage
‚Ä¢ Experience with web applications
‚Ä¢ Experience with REST API and websocket
‚Ä¢ Experience with agile processes, especially SCRUM and continuous integration
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of best practices for modern web application development
‚Ä¢ Experience with the NoSQL MongoDB database
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of cloud deployment, AWS, Lamda, Red Shift or the like

Would be good:

‚Ä¢ BS in computer science or the like
‚Ä¢ Interest in getting to know the cryptocurrency markets or trading

Benefits

‚úì Flexible hours, 38 hours per week
‚úì One day a week remote
‚úì Salary ‚Ç¨36000* / Year
‚úì Annual contribution to books or conference
‚úì Discounts from the corporate intranet
‚úì Stock options

jobs.title: Lead Front-End Developer !! Remote, Part-time, Salary, Stock Options !!
jobs.description:
At Coinrule.io we‚Äôre always looking ahead. 

We want to create the best *crypto-currency* trading experience possible for our customers. This is a great opportunity for a highly creative and enthusiastic technology leader to join Coinrule. 

As a Lead Backend Developer, you will develop innovative software and manage a talented team of hodling developers.

*Experience*
- At least 2+ years proven experience as a back-end developer
- Experience with *Python*
- Experience working with React 
- Knowledge of cloud deployment, AWS or similar
- Experience of consuming REST API‚Äôs, JSON, web services
- Experience of Agile particularly SCRUM and Continuous Integration

*Great Benefits*
‚úì 20 hours a week :snowboarder:
‚úì *Remote*
‚úì Salary *$15000* / Year
‚úì Competitive full-time salary after fundraising
‚úì *Equity %* :unicorn_face:
‚úì $500 new books or conference allowance
‚úì Discounts from the company intranet

http://www.coinrule.io

hr@coinrule.io
